sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>120</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/120</github_url> <message>If you ever want to find if a CI is stale or not via script, you can do this in a single line. ```javascript gs.info(SNC.DiscoveryCIReconciler.isStale('["' + config_ci_sysID + '"]')); ```</message> <number>TIL0001127</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-13 07:17:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b2d919b32f9fc51051dad5f62799b62e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-17 08:14:38</sys_updated_on> <title>Find if a CI is stale</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
